original_text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar: and they filled a spunge with vinegar, and put it upon hyssop, and put it to his mouth.
korean_text: 거기 신 포도주가 가득히 담긴 그릇이 있는지라 사람들이 신 포도주를 적신 해면을 우슬초에 매어 예수의 입에 대니

sentences.original_text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 식초가 가득 담긴 그릇이 놓여 있었고

sentences.original_text: and they filled a spunge with vinegar
and put it to his mouth
